about_the_game:
The soundtrack for "Paper Bride 5: Two Lifetimes" features 2 original songs that capture the beauty of Chinese culture with a traditional accompaniment.

The main theme "Two Lifetimes" is pop song with elements of Chinese opera. The accompaniment is complemented by string embellishments to present a unique Chinese style, echoing the concept of "rebirth".

The interlude "Moon Wanes, Flowers Fall" was written in a traditional style dating back to the Republic of China. Vocals were processed with effects to resemble an old record, echoing the nostalgic atmosphere of the time.

The WAV files for the theme songs feature 2304kbps bit-rate for high-quality, lossless audio while this touching love story about past and present lives together unfolds. The world of Paper Bride continues. We await you in the next installment.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
